description: Helper metadata file used by the assistant to keep repository context: important files, commands, environment, and dependencies.
notes: sendBurst(bus, senderId, data) is used by scheiber.py to send simulated CAN bursts.
push_light_button(can_interface='can1') will initialize socketcan on the interface and send two message bursts with 200ms between them.
analyser.py is an interactive CAN sniffer; press spacebar to clear the screen.
